body: @laboger, those are two different things. What you actually want are binary downloads. We did that for FreeBSD and s390x, even though I argue neither of those are a first class port. It's possible we could host ppc64{,le} binaries, but I don't think we're ready to make ppc64 a first-class port just yet. I'll let @ianlancetaylor, @dr2chase, et al chime in.
